TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridColumnCollectionEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides an editing user interface (UI) for the column collection of a control.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollectionEditor> class and the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> class (the collection editor's base class) with a custom `Columns` property. The property is a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> class.
[!code-csharp[Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples/CS/WebControlDesignerCollectionEditors.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples/VB/webcontroldesignercollectioneditors.vb#4)]

Docs.param: The object indicating the context of the object being edited.
The object containing a reference to the associated designer.
Docs.summary: Edits the specified value using the specified context descriptor and service provider.
Docs.returns: The final value of the object after it has been edited.

Docs.summary: Gets the editing style associated with this editor, using the specified object.
Docs.returns: The value representing the editing style of this editor. The default is .
